data.name: Spectrum's Path Demo
data.detailed_description:
Preview the calling of the spectrum's path with our first strike package. Represents content in active development and may vary from presentation in the finished product.

======================================================

No regard. No shame. And no fooling.


It is cycle 36 in generation code #24XX. Time is of the essence more than ever, and this could be the last thing we shall ever know. A dark conquest has begun that, unbeknownst to its originator, has the potential to result in the full termination of all known existence. And no less than three unique worlds have already been fused under the mechanations at work.

But it's not over yet. Fate is about to call ten unique individuals to put an end to further intrusion on the essence of all that is known. But this is no ordinary task, nor an ordinary call to action. This is the kind of situation for which anyone can be ascribed to fate. The kind of situation whose ascribed champion can be originated from anywhere. The kind of situation where practically anything can happen...

and will, because that's exactly what was to come and who to expect as the calling for this job has reached those born of the spectrum's path, a consideration not
easily described of themselves, even to this day. The mission to come may be difficult, even in terms of their unique considerations. But there's one clear thing as our crew prepares to assemble, as the situation responsible for such extreme measures...

has only just begun.

data.short_description: Preview the calling of the spectrum's path with our first strike package. Represents content in active development and may vary from presentation in the finished product. A dark conquest has begun that, unbeknownst to its originator, has the potential to result in the full termination of all known existence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Graphics: GeForce 700 series or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: GeForce 10 series or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
